name: pegasus_heroes|Button_Name_HammerTime_Button
tooltip: Spin around, gaining <d ref="duckiesHeroPaladinSpin_HostBuff.modifiers[1].amount" style="Blue"/> armor and dealing <d ref="duckiesHeroPaladinSpin_impactDamage.amount/duckiesHeroPaladinSpin_HostBuff.periodic_duration" style="Blue"/> damage per second to nearby enemies. Damaged enemies will have their attack speed briefly reduced by 60%. Lasts <d ref="duckiesHeroPaladinSpin_HostBuff.duration"/> seconds.
